alert.note: Alert for Bedford; Cannon; Coffee (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued April 13 at 8:28PM CDT until April 13 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northwestern Coffee County in Middle Tennessee... East central Bedford County in Middle Tennessee... South central Cannon County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 828 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 11 miles east of Shelbyville, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Manchester around 840 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Wartrace, Beechgrove and Summitville. This includes Interstate 24 between mile markers 97 and 110. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
